title: Zero Knowlege Mastermind
description: Smart-contract based mastermind game secured with zero knowlege proofs.

title: Dovetale
description: An affiliate and influencer marketing platform where I built machine learning algorithms to improve search, and worked as a full-stack engineer. Later acquired by Shopify.

title: Von Token
description: My own ERC20 cryptocurrency with Solidity and built a decentralized appliation to interact with it.

title: Ascend
description: Real estate data aggregation and search platform I built as the product manager.

title: Neural Network Engine
description: An basic engine to build multi-layer neural networks. I made a simple neural network with the engine to demonstrate its capability.

title: Deep Learning Chatbot Engine
description: An engine to create customizable chatbots (using an admittedly simple approach), with my own chatbot built from the engine.

title: TruckWorld Reinforcement Learning
description: Reinforcement learning environment functionally similar to OpenAI Gym. I also built an agent to run in the environment.

title: Trip Advisor Sentiment Analysis
description: I scraped the Trip Advisor reviews for Barclays Center in NYC to analyze customer sentiment.

title: Bank Customer Analysis
description: A neural network that analyzes data about bank customers to predict their likelihood of remaining with a given bank.
